summary:
ENB Photoreal by VattGhern

High Performance

Requiements:
-ENB v0.168 by Bois Vorontsov
descriptionHtml:
[center]Ultra Performance ENB - Real [/center]

Please subscribe my channel on YouTube:

[youtube]Ydb2FYkM2Ss[/youtube]


Instalation:
1.
Edit your skyrimprefs.ini:

[Display]
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=5 
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iShadowMaskQuarter=4
iShadowMapResolution=4096 (if your machine i fast enough, otherwise use 2048)
iMultiSample=0 (disables the game Antialiasing)
bFXAAEnabled=0 (or set it to 1 and press shift+enter in game and deactivate EdgeAA in menu)

2.
Deactivate AA / SSAO in game settings AND/OR over videodriver

3.
Copy all files files from my ENB to Skyrim main folder

5.
Copy d3d9.dll by Boris Vorontsov to Skyrim main folder

Optional:

-Install Realistic Lighting Overhaul by sydney666



My PC:
-Intel Pentium Dual Core 2.2GHZ
-ATI Radeon Asus HD5770 1 GB DDR5 CU Core
-2GB DDR2 RAM
author: VattGhern
